name: places/ChIJsZLEW1pYwokRocjM7COUYJI
formattedAddress: 550 W 54th St, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 550 W 54th St, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text:
If you are looking for a luxury health and fitness experience for a good price, Mercedes Club is the gym for you. I have been a member for 10 years and I don't imagine working out anywhere else.

The gym is a breath of fresh air, literally and figuratively. It has a spacious and clean environment. I love the openness of the layout and the large windows. The gym does not feel cramped or claustrophobic. The natural light helps me feel more energized and positive. The equipment is state-of-the-art and always in good condition, and you can choose from a variety of weight-lifting and cardio machines.

The staff is friendly and helpful, and the goers are respectful and friendly. Another thing I appreciate about Mercedes Club is that it respects my privacy and personal space. I am the person that likes to be left alone to work out and that is possible there. The staff and the goers are not intrusive or pushy, and they let me do my own thing. I can focus on my goals and enjoy my time at the gym. The ambiance is nice and motivating, without being too noisy or distracting.

The club is also equipped with an indoor and outdoor pool which is a great bonus. The outdoor pool is especially nice in the summer when I can enjoy the sun and the breeze.

The only thing that could be an annoyance is the peak hours on weekdays when the gym gets busy between 6 and 8 pm like any other club in NY. But even then, the gym is large enough to fit everyone comfortably, and you can always find a place to do your workout.

I enjoy going there and I think you will too. It's the perfect place for anyone who wants to take care of their health and fitness. It's a high-end club without the snobbery or pretentiousness of places like Equinox. You can feel the difference as soon as you walk in.

originalText.text: Joined the Mercedes fitness club a few months ago and I cannot say enough good things about it. The staff is so friendly and accommodating. The gym is fantastic and well equipped for any kind of workout. The change rooms are always clean and quite. And I love the lounge area for when I want to get work done. There are also a wide variety of classes for you to choose from if u want a more guided workout. Additionally, the trainers are super friendly and helpful. I highly recommend Julian, he‚Äôs very knowledgeable and great at helping to achieve specific goals or if you just want a more personalized workout. He will listen to your goals and aspirations and work that Information into your routine. Plus he has great advice on nutrition. The club is also equipped with an indoor and outdoor pool which is a great added bonus. Join up u won‚Äôt be sorry!
